name: The Old-Fashioned
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon superfine sugar or 2 tablespoons simple syrup

recipeInstructions.text: In a double-rocks (old-fashioned) glass combine sugar and bitters. Add a couple of teaspoons of hot water, and stir together until sugar is dissolved. Add orange slice, and mull until well mixed. Fill glass with ice, and top with bourbon, stir well. Garnish with lemon peel, twisted to release oil, and cherry.
